aggressive.prompt:
A medium shot of a person speaking directly to camera in a A brightly lit, modern indoor space with a clean, minimalist aesthetic. The background is softly blurred, suggesting a home or office environment..

CHARACTER: A female in her early to mid-20s with a friendly and approachable appearance. She has long, shoulder-length dark brown hair styled in soft waves with subtle lighter brown highlights, parted slightly off-center. Her facial features include large, expressive brown eyes, well-defined arched eyebrows, and a bright, genuine smile with straight white teeth. She has a slender build and is dressed in a casual, relatable style: a simple, form-fitting white crew-neck t-shirt and light-wash, high-waisted denim jeans.

SETTING: A brightly lit, modern indoor space with a clean, minimalist aesthetic. The background is softly blurred, suggesting a home or office environment.

CAMERA: dynamic, energetic camera movement

Duration: 12 seconds
Style: Professional advertising, direct-to-camera testimonial, authentic and relatable
Quality: 4K, sharp focus, well-lit, professional production value
